paper_abstract: This paper deals with the random linear advection equation for which the time-dependent velocity and the initial condition are independent random functions. Expressions for the density and joint density functions of the solution are given. We also verify that in the Gaussian time-dependent velocity case the probability density function of the solution satisfies a convection diffusion equation with a time-dependent diffusion coefficient. Some exact examples are presented. (C) 2011 IMACS. Published by Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: On the linear advection equation subject to random velocity fields
